lines.text: I'd like a little respect. I told you before I don't like people I'm talkin' to to walk away from me. Look at me! You look at me when I talk to you.
I'm lookin', but I don't see anything.
Why don't you have a picture taken, Linnett, with your pretty dress and bonnet?
Well, what would I do with it?
Look at it now and then. In ten years from now, you'll know what you looked like today.
